Text:
Thanks vtwin ........ another nice upload ....
but then you hav so many .....

Any chance you have  "The Cowsills Live in Concert" ?

There are several great songs on that album that are not on their other albums ... Walk Away Renee,  Postman, etc

I have been looking for a couple years and have only found it available on Amazon for $50+

I'd be glad to buy it .... but not for $50 which I simply can not afford.

Anyhow .... thanks either way .... first request I've ever made from anyone .... but as mentioned, I search pirate bay about once a month for cowsills and finally found this so have to ask.

Take care.  Thanks again.

cyberkeg...pm me on suprbay & I'll send you a link to where I found a copy of it.

Cheers m8.
